column4: I'm using ubunutu with the kde and xfce desktops installed. well usually I use the xfce desktop but I was having trouble getting a game to run, so I wanted to try it in gnome but the gnome desktop wont come up
anyone know how i get my desktop back? i went into synaptic and reinatlled it but it still doesnt work
which desktop are you trying to get back?
the screen comes up with a blue wavy background, no icons, no nothing
sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop says its already installed and is the newest version
thanks its doing, 'something'. whats the ^ for?
not sure, but it seems to do a more thorough job
